response.overview: We are telling the story of South African super star rapper, Jack Parow. From where he grew up in hardship in the northern suburbs in Cape Town, South Africa to where he mainlines his own festival in Utrecht in the Netherlands. Interviews with friends, foes and family as well as looking back into the archives. This is a story of dreams coming true if you are willing to work really hard.
response.title: From Parow to Parowfest
